name: Early Hours
description: For early risers and people who need to get work done before the rest of the world wakes up. The tone is soft and doesn't push too hard. This is not a 'seize the day' show—it's more 'the day is happening whether we like it or not.'

presenters.notes: Mostly duo, some solo when energy is really low

tone.mood: Soft, not fully caffeinated yet, acknowledging it's early

check_ins: For everyone up before the sun
sample_lines: Good morning. Or just 'morning,' really. 'Good' is ambitious at 4am.
The sun's not up yet, but you are. That's either dedication or poor planning.
That was 'Pre-Dawn Focus' for anyone who's been awake since before it was socially acceptable.

handover.style: Gentle transition from night to early morning, acknowledging the shift

winter.tone_adjustment: Reference darkness, sunrise times much later, cold mornings

summer.tone_adjustment: Reference sunrise being much earlier, already light outside, birds chirping

christmas_period.tone_adjustment: Acknowledge holiday mornings, family time, time off work
christmas_period.notes: Some people are up early even on holidays

ai_budget.notes: 30% talk = 54 minutes = 3240 seconds of TTS maximum, 70% music = 126 minutes
